trailingComments.value: Do animation in next frame to avoid a forced reflow

leadingComments.value: Remove height as we want the level to naturally grow if content is added later

trailingComments.value: We read the offset height to force a reflow, this is needed to start the transition between absolute values

leadingComments.value: We read the offset height to force a reflow, this is needed to start the transition between absolute values
Make sure it's animated next time

trailingComments.value: Hide it on initialization if closed
